  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4055</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Perspective Projection</string>
            <string language="es">Proyección de perspectiva</string>
            <string language="ga">Teilgean Peirspictíoch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Perspektive-Projektion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Projection de Perspective</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Projeção Do Perspective</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Proiezione Di Prospettiva</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προβολή προοπτικής</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A checklist outlining the steps or procedures involved in the production of a perspective projection.</string>
            <string language="es">Una lista de comprobación que describe los pasos o procedimientos relacionados con la producción de una proyección de perspectiva.</string>
            <string language="ga">Seicliosta a imlíníonn céimeanna nó nósanna imeachta a bhaineann le teilgean peirspictíoch a chur ar fáil.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Technical Drawing</string>
            <string language="es">Dibujo técnico. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Líníocht Theicniúil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Checkliste, welche die Jobsteps oder die 
Prozeduren mit einbezogen in die Produktion einer 
Perspektiveprojektion umreißt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une liste de contrôle traçant les grandes lignes
des étapes ou des procédures impliquées dans la production d'une 
projection de perspective.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma lista de verificação que esboça as etapas 
ou os procedimentos envolvidas na produção de uma projeção do 
perspective.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una lista di controllo che descrive i punti o le 
procedure addetti alla produzione di una proiezione di prospettiva.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας πίνακας ελέγχου που περιγράφει τα βήματα ή τις 
διαδικασίες που περιλαμβάνονται στην παραγωγή μιας προβολής 
προοπτικής.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Technische Zeichnung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Schéma Technique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Desenho Técnico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Illustrazione Tecnica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τεχνικό σχέδιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
